attributes.action: Make sure that all in school Teachers and TAs are vaccinated ASAP.
attributes.additional_details: Teaching Assistants are performing much of the in school teaching to support other front line careers like NHS staff and other teachers and key workers. They have no PPE protection and have exposure directly to a lot of pupils from many families so they have very high exposure.
attributes.background: Urgently prioritise vaccinating Teachers and Teaching assistants who are in school to protect their lives. We should protect people who are in school with the same priority as other front line workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
